text:
Hello, I would like to use the `{% dnd_area %}` functionality in my coded pages, so that my users can add extra custom modules after the main content.
It works, but in the page editor, I would like them to be able to use only the custom modules I created for them. So I would not display "common modules" and custom modules I don't want them to use.
Is there a way to specify which modules can be accessible through `{% dnd_area %}` ?
Yo! Can we `export_content_to_template` from a custom module with repeaters within the context of a blog post?
Is it possible to only display a blog topic if it matches a certain string? Ignore anything else that doesn't meet that criteria?
